title: Desktop based shoe warehouse application
description: This application aims to simplify the management of shoe stock in the warehouse, including recording incoming and outgoing goods, as well as stock reports.

title: Website app story
description: This website is designed to showcase a variety of interesting stories, with location features that can be viewed by users.

title: Website recommendation beach
description: This website is designed to provide recommendations for the best beaches in Indonesia, complete with location information and short descriptions, as well as a search feature that makes it easy for users to find beaches according to their preferences.

title: Website bookshelf app
description: This website functions as a digital bookshelf application, allowing users to add, edit, and delete books from their shelves. A search feature is also provided to make it easier for users to find the books they want.
